description: The 2023 Rawlings Raptor Drop 12 USA Tee Ball Bat is engineered for young athletes eager to make their mark on the field. This bat boasts a balanced swing feel, making it perfect for budding players to develop their skills with confidence. Its one-piece composite design features a striking blue and silver colorway, ensuring it stands out in any lineup. With a barrel diameter of 2 1/4 inches, this USA certified bat is specifically crafted for tee ball use, making it ideal for hitting balls off a tee rather than thrown baseballs.
